tools.name: BoxSERS
tools.one_line_profile: Python package for processing and analyzing vibrational spectra (Raman, SERS, FTIR)
tools.detailed_description: BoxSERS is a Python package designed for the processing and analysis of vibrational spectra, including Raman, SERS, and FTIR data. It provides functionality for baseline subtraction, smoothing, normalization, and peak detection, facilitating the extraction of chemical information from spectral datasets.

tools.name: SpectroMap
tools.one_line_profile: Peak detection algorithm using constellation maps for signal analysis
tools.detailed_description: SpectroMap is a peak detection tool that utilizes a constellation map approach to identify peaks in signals. It is designed to handle spectral data and provide robust peak identification capabilities.

tools.name: NMRProcFlow
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive GUI for 1D NMR metabolomics spectra processing
tools.detailed_description: NMRProcFlow is an open-source software that provides a graphical user interface for the processing and visualization of 1D NMR metabolomics data. It facilitates spectral alignment, baseline correction, and peak integration, specifically tailored for metabolomics workflows.

tools.name: Risa
tools.one_line_profile: R package for processing ISA-tab metadata and data into Bioconductor structures
tools.detailed_description: Risa is an R package that serves as a bridge between the ISA-tab metadata format and Bioconductor data structures. It allows for the parsing of ISA-tab files and processing of associated mass spectrometry data into xcmsSet objects for further metabolomics or proteomics analysis.

tools.name: vg-beat-detectors
tools.one_line_profile: Fast R-peak detectors for ECG based on Visibility Graphs
tools.detailed_description: vg-beat-detectors provides fast and sample-accurate algorithms for detecting R-peaks in electrocardiogram (ECG) signals using Visibility Graphs. It offers an alternative to traditional signal processing methods for heart rate variability analysis.

tools.name: ampdLib
tools.one_line_profile: Python implementation of the Automatic Multiscale Peak Detection (AMPD) algorithm
tools.detailed_description: ampdLib is a Python library implementing the Automatic Multiscale Peak Detection (AMPD) algorithm. It is designed for robust peak detection in periodic and quasi-periodic signals, useful in various scientific signal processing tasks.

tools.name: LumiSpy
tools.one_line_profile: HyperSpy extension for luminescence spectroscopy data analysis
tools.detailed_description: LumiSpy is an extension for the HyperSpy library, specifically designed for the analysis of luminescence spectroscopy data. It provides tools for handling, processing, and analyzing multidimensional luminescence datasets.

tools.name: nmrkit

tools.detailed_description: A collection of microservices designed to simplify NMR data processing and analysis, developed by NFDI4Chem.

tools.name: nmrpy

tools.detailed_description: A Python module dedicated to the processing and analysis of Nuclear Magnetic Resonance (NMR) spectra.

tools.name: LFMF

tools.detailed_description: C++ implementation of the NTIA/ITS Low Frequency / Medium Frequency (LF/MF) Propagation Model for predicting transmission loss.

tools.detailed_description: A Python package for training and deploying artificial neural networks for spectral analysis, specifically designed for radioisotope identification from gamma-ray spectra.

tools.name: ProSpect
tools.one_line_profile: Generative model for galaxy spectral energy distributions
tools.detailed_description: An R package for generating and fitting spectral energy distributions (SEDs) of galaxies, used in astronomy to model star formation histories and metallicity.

tools.name: G-SchNet
tools.one_line_profile: Generative model for 3D molecular structures
tools.detailed_description: A generative neural network model for generating 3D molecular structures by placing atoms sequentially in 3D space, useful for drug discovery and materials science.

tools.name: ms-pred
tools.one_line_profile: Neural network model for predicting tandem mass spectra from molecules
tools.detailed_description: A tool for predicting tandem mass spectra (MS/MS) from molecular structures using neural networks. It aids in the identification of small molecules by generating synthetic spectra for comparison with experimental data.

tools.name: spectrai
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning framework for spectral data analysis
tools.detailed_description: spectrai is a deep learning framework designed specifically for handling and analyzing spectral data, providing tools for training models on spectroscopic datasets.

tools.name: nonnegative_matrix_factorization
tools.one_line_profile: NMF implementation for GC-MS spectral deconvolution
tools.detailed_description: A Java implementation of Non-negative Matrix Factorization (NMF) specifically tailored for the spectral deconvolution of Gas Chromatography-Mass Spectrometry (GC-MS) data.

tools.name: SpectralMachine
tools.one_line_profile: Machine learning software for rapid analysis of scientific spectra
tools.detailed_description: SpectralMachine is a software tool designed to apply machine learning algorithms to the analysis of scientific spectral data, facilitating rapid classification and feature extraction.

tools.name: cfmR
tools.one_line_profile: R Wrapper for CFM-ID metabolite identification algorithm
tools.detailed_description: cfmR provides an R interface to the Competitive Fragmentation Modeling for Metabolite Identification (CFM-ID) algorithm, enabling users to predict electrospray ionization tandem mass spectra (ESI-MS/MS) from chemical structures.

tools.name: PyCFMID
tools.one_line_profile: Python wrapper for CFM-ID
tools.detailed_description: PyCFMID is a Python wrapper for the CFM-ID (Competitive Fragmentation Modeling for Metabolite Identification) tool, allowing Python users to integrate MS/MS spectrum prediction and metabolite identification into their workflows.

tools.name: spec2vec
tools.one_line_profile: Word2Vec based similarity measure for mass spectrometry data
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that computes spectral similarities between mass spectra using a Word2Vec-based approach, treating peaks and losses as 'words' in a document.

tools.name: Prosit
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning model for high quality MS2 spectra and iRT prediction
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework that predicts peptide tandem mass spectra and retention times (iRT) for any organism and protease, facilitating proteomic data analysis.

tools.name: PredFull
tools.one_line_profile: Full-spectrum prediction of peptide tandem mass spectra using Deep Neural Networks
tools.detailed_description: A deep neural network model designed to predict the full tandem mass spectra of peptides, aiding in peptide identification and proteomic analysis.

tools.name: ms2deepscore
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning similarity measure for comparing MS/MS spectra
tools.detailed_description: A tool that uses deep learning to predict the structural similarity between two chemical structures based on their MS/MS spectra.

tools.name: SPECTRA
tools.one_line_profile: Spectral framework for evaluation of biomedical AI models
tools.detailed_description: A framework designed for the evaluation and benchmarking of biomedical AI models, specifically focusing on tasks involving spectral data or spectral graph theory applications in biomedicine.

tools.name: pDeepXL
tools.one_line_profile: MS/MS spectrum prediction for cross-linked peptide pairs
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning-based tool for predicting MS/MS spectra of cross-linked peptides, aiding in the analysis of cross-linking mass spectrometry (XL-MS) data.

tools.name: CoSpred
tools.one_line_profile: Mass Spectrometry Spectrum Prediction Workflow
tools.detailed_description: A workflow for predicting mass spectrometry spectra, developed by Pfizer Open Source, likely for metabolomics or small molecule analysis.

tools.name: SIRIUS Client OpenAPI
tools.one_line_profile: OpenAPI client libraries for interacting with SIRIUS services
tools.detailed_description: Provides generated client libraries (Python, R, etc.) to interact with the SIRIUS web services and local instances programmatically, enabling automation of metabolite identification workflows.

tools.name: Trident
tools.one_line_profile: Synthetic spectral generation suite for astrophysical simulations
tools.detailed_description: Trident is a Python package for creating synthetic absorption-line spectra from astrophysical hydrodynamics simulations. It allows researchers to generate mock observations to compare with real telescopic data.

tools.name: Spectral-Gromov-Wasserstein
tools.one_line_profile: Library for spectral graph matching and clustering via optimal transport
tools.detailed_description: Implements the Spectral Gromov-Wasserstein distance for comparing and matching shapes or graphs based on their heat kernels. Useful in scientific data analysis for shape correspondence and structural comparison.

tools.name: Oktoberfest
tools.one_line_profile: Rescoring and spectral library generation pipeline for proteomics
tools.detailed_description: Oktoberfest is a pipeline that uses deep learning predictions (e.g., from Prosit) to generate spectral libraries and rescore peptide-spectrum matches (PSMs) in proteomics data, improving identification rates.

tools.name: SpectralAnalysis
tools.one_line_profile: Software for analysis and interactive exploration of spectral imaging data
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB-based tool designed for the processing, analysis, and interactive exploration of spectral imaging datasets, facilitating the handling of complex hyperspectral data.

tools.name: GNPS Workflows
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of public workflows for the GNPS mass spectrometry platform
tools.detailed_description: Contains the source code and definitions for the scientific workflows used in the Global Natural Products Social Molecular Networking (GNPS) platform for mass spectrometry data analysis.

tools.name: PymePix
tools.one_line_profile: Control and acquisition library for Timepix3-SPIDR hardware in mass spectrometry
tools.detailed_description: A Python library providing control, acquisition, and visualization for Timepix3-SPIDR hardware, specifically geared toward mass spectrometry and ion imaging applications.

tools.name: GNPS-Trinity
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow combining LC-MS feature detection, molecular networking, and in silico annotation
tools.detailed_description: A collaborative workflow for untargeted metabolomics that integrates LC-MS feature detection, molecular networking, and in silico annotation to enhance compound identification.

tools.name: AlphaViz
tools.one_line_profile: Browser-based interactive visualization tool for Bruker mass spectrometry data
tools.detailed_description: A visualization tool that allows for the interactive exploration of processed mass spectrometry data acquired with Bruker instruments, developed by MannLabs.

tools.name: pyopenms_viz
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization tools for mass spectrometry data using Pandas and pyOpenMS
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that streamlines the visualization of mass spectrometry data by integrating pyOpenMS with Pandas and plotting libraries.

tools.name: ProteoWizard
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive library and toolset for mass spectrometry data access and analysis
tools.detailed_description: A robust set of open-source software libraries and tools designed for proteomics and mass spectrometry data analysis. It provides cross-platform data access and standard format conversion (e.g., mzML).

tools.name: SIVIC
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for processing and visualizing DICOM MR Spectroscopy data
tools.detailed_description: An open-source, standards-based software framework and application suite for processing and visualizing DICOM MR Spectroscopy (MRS) data, facilitating its application in medical imaging studies.

tools.name: GLabViz
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive analysis and visualization application for scientific data
tools.detailed_description: A GUI application written in Python using Qt and pyqtgraph, designed for the interactive analysis and visualization of general scientific data.

tools.name: DO-MS
tools.one_line_profile: Data-Driven Optimization of Mass Spectrometry methods
tools.detailed_description: A modular and extensible application for the visualization of mass spectrometry data and the optimization of data acquisition parameters to improve proteomics results.

tools.name: GNP-WGAN
tools.one_line_profile: Generative adversarial networks for seismic data reconstruction
tools.detailed_description: Implements Generative Non-Local A Priori Augmented Wasserstein Generative Adversarial Networks for the reconstruction of missing seismic data.

tools.name: TSFitPy
tools.one_line_profile: Spectral fitting tool for stellar spectroscopy using Turbospectrum
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool for determining stellar parameters and abundances by fitting synthetic spectra (generated via Turbospectrum) to observed stellar spectra.

tools.name: ssNMR-Topspin-Python
tools.one_line_profile: Scripts for calculating solid-state NMR match conditions
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Python scripts designed to calculate match conditions for solid-state Nuclear Magnetic Resonance (ssNMR) experiments within the Topspin environment.

tools.name: GNPS_LCMSDashboard
tools.one_line_profile: Web-based dashboard for visualizing LC-MS data
tools.detailed_description: A web-based viewer and dashboard for the visualization and inspection of Liquid Chromatography-Mass Spectrometry (LC-MS) data, integrated with the GNPS ecosystem.

tools.name: spectool-web
tools.one_line_profile: Web viewer for WiSPY and Ubertooth spectrum data
tools.detailed_description: A web-based visualization tool for analyzing radio frequency (RF) spectrum data captured by WiSPY and Ubertooth devices.

tools.name: Chromascope
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight GUI for visualizing mass spectrometry data
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight graphical user interface application written in Rust for the visualization of mass spectrometry data.

tools.name: Spectrix
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive histogram fitter and visualization tool for nuclear physics
tools.detailed_description: An interactive tool for 1D/2D histogram fitting and data visualization, specifically designed for nuclear physics analysis, built with Rust.

tools.name: unmixing
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive tools for spectral mixture analysis of multispectral data
tools.detailed_description: A Python package providing interactive tools for performing spectral mixture analysis (unmixing) on multispectral raster data, useful in remote sensing.

tools.name: geo_neural_op
tools.one_line_profile: Geometric Neural Operators for learning on point clouds and solving PDEs
tools.detailed_description: Implements Geometric Neural Operators (GNPs) for machine learning tasks on point-cloud representations, including curvature estimation, shape deformations, and solving geometric PDEs.

tools.name: Prospector
tools.one_line_profile: Stellar population inference from spectra and SEDs
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for conducting stellar population inference from spectroscopic and spectral energy distribution (SED) data using Bayesian methods.

tools.name: pyOpenMS_UmetaFlow
tools.one_line_profile: Untargeted metabolomics workflow using pyOpenMS
tools.detailed_description: A workflow for untargeted metabolomics data processing and analysis, implemented in Jupyter notebooks using the pyOpenMS library.

tools.name: spectrum_utils
tools.one_line_profile: Efficient mass spectrometry data processing and visualization
tools.detailed_description: A Python package providing efficient methods for processing and visualizing mass spectrometry data, including spectrum annotation and plotting.

tools.name: APOSTL
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive affinity proteomics analysis and visualization software
tools.detailed_description: Software for reformatting affinity proteomics data for statistical analysis (SAINTexpress) and visualizing the results, supporting both spectral counting and MS1 data.

tools.name: radiacode
tools.one_line_profile: Control and analysis tool for RadiaCode radiation detectors
tools.detailed_description: A Python library and tool to control RadiaCode-10x radiation detectors, collect real-time measurements, and analyze gamma-ray spectra.

tools.name: Web-Trace-Viewer
tools.one_line_profile: Web-based chromatogram trace viewer
tools.detailed_description: A web-based application for visualizing chromatogram traces, suitable for inspecting separation science data.

tools.name: BatMass
tools.one_line_profile: Mass spectrometry data visualization tool
tools.detailed_description: A Java-based desktop application for the visualization and analysis of mass spectrometry data, focusing on performance and user experience.

tools.name: mMass
tools.one_line_profile: Open source mass spectrometry tool
tools.detailed_description: An open-source software package for the processing and analysis of mass spectrometry data, known for its user-friendly interface and comprehensive feature set.

tools.name: Spectral-Clara-Lux-Tracer
tools.one_line_profile: Physically based spectral ray tracer with CRI evaluation
tools.detailed_description: A physically based ray tracer that supports multiple shading models and evaluates the Color Rendering Index (CRI), useful for optical simulation and lighting research.

tools.name: protViz
tools.one_line_profile: Visualizing and analyzing mass spectrometry data in proteomics
tools.detailed_description: An R package for visualizing and analyzing mass spectrometry data, specifically tailored for proteomics applications.

tools.name: SpectralFormer
tools.one_line_profile: Transformer-based model for hyperspectral image classification
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of SpectralFormer, a transformer-based deep learning model designed for the classification of hyperspectral remote sensing images.

tools.name: SpectralGPT
tools.one_line_profile: Foundation model for spectral remote sensing data analysis
tools.detailed_description: A spectral remote sensing foundation model designed to handle hyperspectral data for various downstream tasks in remote sensing and earth observation.

tools.name: NP3_MS_Workflow
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for LC-MS/MS metabolomics data processing
tools.detailed_description: A workflow pipeline designed for the processing and analysis of LC-MS/MS metabolomics data, facilitating downstream biological interpretation.

tools.name: HyperSpectralToolbox
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB toolbox for hyperspectral image analysis
tools.detailed_description: A collection of algorithms and tools for processing and analyzing hyperspectral imagery data, including dimensionality reduction and target detection.

tools.name: rcwa
tools.one_line_profile: Rigorous Coupled Wave Analysis for photonic crystals
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of Rigorous Coupled Wave Analysis (RCWA) for calculating reflection and transmission spectra of photonic crystals and layered structures.

tools.name: rawDiag
tools.one_line_profile: Diagnostic plots for Orbitrap mass spectrometry data
tools.detailed_description: An R package for visualizing and diagnosing raw mass spectrometry data from Thermo Orbitrap instruments, focusing on scan attributes and instrument performance.

tools.name: fooof
tools.one_line_profile: Parameterizing neural power spectra
tools.detailed_description: A tool for parameterizing neural power spectra into periodic and aperiodic components, useful for analyzing electrophysiological data.

tools.name: MS-DAP
tools.one_line_profile: Downstream analysis pipeline for quantitative proteomics
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for the downstream analysis of quantitative proteomics data, including quality control, normalization, and differential expression analysis.

tools.name: MMASS
tools.one_line_profile: Frederik J Simons Mostly Matlab Archive of Scientific Software
tools.detailed_description: A collection of MATLAB tools for geophysics and spectral analysis, maintained by Frederik J Simons.

tools.name: GNP
tools.one_line_profile: Graph Neural Preconditioners for linear solvers
tools.detailed_description: A Python package implementing Graph Neural Preconditioners to accelerate the solution of linear systems, applicable in scientific computing and simulation.

tools.name: mms2plot
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization of multiple tandem mass spectrometry data
tools.detailed_description: An R tool for visualizing multiple tandem mass spectrometry (MS/MS) datasets, aiding in the comparison and interpretation of spectral data.

tools.name: QMRITools
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for quantitative MRI data processing
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive toolbox for the processing, analysis, and visualization of quantitative MRI data, implemented in Mathematica.

tools.name: Metaboseek
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive analysis of mass spectrometry data
tools.detailed_description: An interactive software platform for browsing and analyzing mass spectrometry data, specifically tailored for metabolomics.

tools.name: mpes
tools.one_line_profile: Processing routines for multidimensional photoemission spectroscopy
tools.detailed_description: A distributed data processing library for multidimensional photoemission spectroscopy (MPES) data, handling large-scale spectral datasets.

tools.name: nf-skyline-dia-ms
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow workflow for DIA proteomics
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow workflow for performing Data-Independent Acquisition (DIA) proteomics analysis using Skyline and other tools.

tools.name: fid-to-wav
tools.one_line_profile: Convert NMR FID files to audio
tools.detailed_description: A utility to convert Free Induction Decay (FID) files from Agilent, Bruker, and Varian NMR instruments into WAV audio files for sonification.

tools.name: ReDU-MS2-GNPS
tools.one_line_profile: Interface to explore public metabolomics data
tools.detailed_description: A user interface and toolset to reanalyze and explore public mass spectrometry data available in the GNPS/ReDU ecosystem.

tools.name: pwiz-mzdb
tools.one_line_profile: ProteoWizard extension for mzDB format
tools.detailed_description: An extension of the ProteoWizard framework that enables support for the mzDB mass spectrometry data format.

tools.name: MZmine
tools.one_line_profile: Open-source software for mass spectrometry data processing
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive open-source software for the processing and analysis of mass spectrometry data, supporting LC-MS and GC-MS workflows.

tools.name: LiveViewOpenCL
tools.one_line_profile: Real-time visualization tools for Imaging Spectrometer development
tools.detailed_description: Open Source real-time visualization tools designed for the development and testing of Imaging Spectrometers, utilizing OpenCL for performance.

tools.name: Shiver
tools.one_line_profile: Spectroscopy Histogram Visualizer for Event Reduction
tools.detailed_description: A visualization tool for neutron spectroscopy data, specifically designed for event reduction and histogram analysis.

tools.name: diaproteomics
tools.one_line_profile: Automated quantitative analysis of DIA proteomics mass spectrometry data
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline for the automated quantitative analysis of Data-Independent Acquisition (DIA) proteomics mass spectrometry measurements.

tools.name: metaboigniter
tools.one_line_profile: Pre-processing pipeline for mass spectrometry-based metabolomics data
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline for pre-processing mass spectrometry-based metabolomics data, performing quantification and identification based on MS1 and MS2 data.

tools.name: mhcquant
tools.one_line_profile: Identify and quantify MHC eluted peptides from mass spectrometry raw data
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics analysis pipeline used to identify and quantify MHC eluted peptides from mass spectrometry raw data.

tools.name: proteomicslfq
tools.one_line_profile: Proteomics label-free quantification (LFQ) analysis pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline for proteomics label-free quantification (LFQ) analysis, handling raw data processing to quantification.

tools.name: inspectro
tools.one_line_profile: Hi-C spectral analysis workflow
tools.detailed_description: A workflow for spectral analysis of Hi-C data, used in genomics to analyze chromatin structure properties.

tools.name: openmsistream
tools.one_line_profile: Materials data streaming applications for laboratory environments
tools.detailed_description: Python applications for streaming materials science data using Apache Kafka, focused on deployment in laboratory environments for real-time data handling.

tools.name: container-pwiz
tools.one_line_profile: Docker container for ProteoWizard tools
tools.detailed_description: A Docker image containing ProteoWizard tools (like msConvert) running via Wine, facilitating the conversion of vendor mass spectrometry formats to mzML.

tools.name: pixlise-ui
tools.one_line_profile: Spectroscopy visualization and analysis for PIXL instrument
tools.detailed_description: User interface and visualization tools for the PIXL (Planetary Instrument for X-ray Lithochemistry) instrument on the Mars 2020 Perseverance rover.

tools.name: DreaMS
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning for molecular representations from mass spectra
tools.detailed_description: A framework for self-supervised learning of molecular representations from millions of tandem mass spectra, enabling advanced chemical analysis.

tools.name: arpespythontools
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis and visualization tools for ARPES data
tools.detailed_description: A Python package to explore, analyze, and visualize Angle Resolved Photoemission Spectroscopy (ARPES) data.

tools.name: spectral-workbench
tools.one_line_profile: Web-based tools for DIY spectrometer data analysis
tools.detailed_description: A web-based platform for collecting, analyzing, and sharing spectral data from DIY spectrometers, developed by Public Lab.

tools.name: spectral-workbench.js
tools.one_line_profile: JavaScript library for spectral data manipulation
tools.detailed_description: The JavaScript core library of Spectral Workbench, enabling recording, manipulation, and analysis of spectrometric data in the browser.

tools.name: pyUSID
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for Universal Spectroscopic and Imaging Data (USID)
tools.detailed_description: A Python framework for storing, visualizing, and processing scientific data formatted according to the Universal Spectroscopic and Imaging Data (USID) schema.

tools.name: spectral-cube
tools.one_line_profile: Library for analyzing astrophysical spectral data cubes
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for reading, writing, manipulating, and analyzing astrophysical spectral data cubes.

tools.name: RADIS
tools.one_line_profile: Fast line-by-line code for high-resolution infrared molecular spectra
tools.detailed_description: A fast, GPU-accelerated line-by-line code for simulating high-resolution infrared molecular spectra under non-equilibrium conditions.

tools.name: MetaMorpheus
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive proteomics search software
tools.detailed_description: A proteomics search software suite with integrated calibration, PTM discovery, bottom-up, top-down, and label-free quantification capabilities.

tools.name: jdaviz
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive astronomical data visualization tools
tools.detailed_description: A package of interactive data visualization and analysis tools for astronomical observations, built on the Jupyter platform.

tools.name: mosviz
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-Object Spectroscopy Visualization Tool
tools.detailed_description: A visualization tool specifically designed for Multi-Object Spectroscopy (MOS) data, allowing simultaneous viewing of spectra and images.

tools.name: specview
tools.one_line_profile: Spectrum visualization and manipulation tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool for 1-D spectrum visualization, manipulation, and fitting, primarily for astronomical data.

tools.name: spectralDNS
tools.one_line_profile: Spectral Navier Stokes solvers
tools.detailed_description: A Python package implementing spectral methods for solving Navier-Stokes and similar equations in fluid dynamics.

tools.name: BruKitchen
tools.one_line_profile: Utilities for Bruker NMR/MRI data
tools.detailed_description: A collection of utilities for handling and processing data from Bruker NMR and MRI systems.

tools.name: MsViz Backend
tools.one_line_profile: Backend service for the MsViz mass spectrometry visualization platform
tools.detailed_description: A Scala-based backend for MsViz, a platform developed by the Swiss Institute of Bioinformatics (SIB) for visualizing mass spectrometry data, supporting proteomics quality control and quantitative analysis.

tools.name: Spectra
tools.one_line_profile: C++ library for large scale eigenvalue problems
tools.detailed_description: A header-only C++ library for solving large scale eigenvalue problems, built on top of Eigen. It is essential for spectral analysis in computational physics, chemistry (e.g., Schrödinger equation), and data science.
